title: Danubio salato (Savoury stuffed Italian rolls)
ingredients: ['For the starter', '7g dried active baking yeast', '100ml warm water', '2 teaspoons sugar', '100g strong white bread flour', 'For the dough', '400g strong white bread flour', '2 eggs', '60ml vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon salt', '200ml warm water', 'For the filling', '100g ham, cubed', '300g mozzarella, cubed', '250g ricotta cheese', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 beaten egg, for brushing']
